entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
